name: Painted Legend
description: Imagine that one day, all the worlds that you have created on paper - live. Brave knights, fearsome dragons and terrible monsters, they all live on the page of your notebook.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Pentium Dual Core E6700 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 405 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 140 MB available space
